oai_dc:dc.dc:title: "Souvenir Folder -- Memphis, Tenn." Postcard Collection
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Exterior Side One: "Souvenir Folder -- Memphis, Tenn. -- Grand Central Station"; Exterior Side Two: "River Front."

Interior: "Bank of Commerce and Trust Co. Building" image; "Union Ave." image; "Cossitt Library and Post Office" image; "Shelby County Court House" image; "Lake and Duck House, Overton Park" image; "Central Bank and Trust Co. Building" image; "Court Square" image; "Confederate Park, Post Office and Mississippi River by Moonlight" image; "New Union Depot" image; "Lily Pond, Forest Park [sic]" image; "Grand Central Station" image; "Peabody Hotel" image; "Confederate Park" image; "Hotel Chisca" image; "Madison Ave." image; "Exchange Building" image; "Pavilion and Lake, Overton Park" image; "Skyscrapers in Business District" image; "Confederate Park and Mississippi River" image; "Madison Ave., looking East" image; "The Speedway" image; "Central High School" image;
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: buildings; parks; hotels; train stations; schools;
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: E.C. Kropp Co., Milwaukee for S.H. Kress & Co.
